person.note: Hu Hong [7252] His sixth generation ancestor called Zhubu gong (not in dataset) came to Jianning during the Five Dynasties. Nobody knew where he came from. His grandfather, Yuan [11868], for the first time learned how to read books. Wu Xiansheng (not in dataset) taught his grandfather the six classics and became his father-in-law. Hong was Anguo's [3394] son. Anguo raised his younger brother's son, Yin [3402], as his own child. Zhang Chi [7164] was the father-in-law of his son. Hong studied with Yang Shi [2022]. Xiang Shen [3357], son of Xiang Zimin's [714] brother Zishao [3359], was the husband of Hong's sister. Wen Yanguo [1956] was the brother of his cousin Hu Yin's grandfather-in-law, Weng Yanshen [4033]. Anguo recommended Chen Guan's [7128] grandnephew and Yang Shi's [2022] son-in-law, Chen Yuan [3094], for his initial appointment. Hu Yin, WJ, 25.1a; SS, 435.1a-22a. CBD, 2, 1558-9.
